com.ipt.ebsa.buildtools.release.manager

Class ReadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.buildtools.release.manager.ReadManager

  • public class ReadManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides set of stateless methods for reading data values from the store. Note that each method makes a new connection. This is because I am not sure how to manage request scoped attributes in Jenkins and I need to be sure the connection gets closed. It is safer to make sure I get a new connection every time until a method becomes known for how to open, share and close a connection per request.
